alert.note: Alert for St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued February 09 at 6:06AM EST until February 09 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than one quarter mile in freezing fog. * WHERE...St. Marys County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential icy spots on roads and sidewalks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Low visibility and potential icy spots will impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.
